did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle:
Guide to the United States Department of Agriculture Bureau of Animal Industry field notebook,
1944.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
did.abstract: One bound notebook kept by an unidentified agent for the United States Department of Agriculture's Bureau of Animal Industry while on the road in 1944.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: One bound notebook kept by an unidentified agent for the United States Department of Agriculture's Bureau of Animal Industry while on the road in 1944. The book details meetings with veterinarians across the country to discuss veterinary issues, primarilly regarding cattle.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: United States. Bureau of Animal Industry.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: United States Department of Agriculture Bureau of Animal Industry Field Notebook, #6594. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

acqinfo.head: PROVENANCE
acqinfo.p: Transferred from the Flower-Sprecher Veterinary Library in 2004.
